title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
Beat eggs with Parmesan, salt, and pepper.
Drain spaghetti, then quickly mix with pancetta and egg mixture.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in spices and yogurt for 2 hours.
Grill or pan-fry chicken until cooked.
Add chicken and cream, simmer 10 mins.

title: Avocado Toast
summary: Toasted bread topped with mashed avocado, salt, pepper, and a drizzle of olive oil.
instructions: Mash avocado with salt and pepper.
Drizzle with olive oil and serve.
